search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Talkadot (talkadot.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Talkadot is: [https://www.talkadot.com/pricing](https://www.talkadot.com/pricing)【3:2†source】.

extracted_content.content:
How much is Talkadot? Choose the right plan for you
---------------------------------------------------

Elite

For serious speaking professionals and those with small teams

$99

/month    
**($1188 billed annually)**

Everything in Pro, plus

*   1 hour private onboarding
    
*   500 simultaneous bonus giveaways (Talkadot code)
    
*   50,000 leads and audience email addresses collected / year
    
*   50,000 post event followup emails sent on your behalf / year
    
*   10 custom questions per code
    
*   5 additional user logins to manage your account
    
*   Shareable Speaker Profile
    

Pro

For speaking professionals

$49

/month    
**($588 billed annually)**

Everything in Lite, plus

*   25 simultaneous bonus giveaways (Talkadot code)
    
*   2,500 audience email addresses collected / year
    
*   2,500 post event followup emails sent on your behalf / year
    
*   2 custom question per code
    
*   Customize or remove rating questions
    
*   Zapier and Speakerflow Integration
    
*   AI Summaries with key learning outcomes of your talks
    

Most Popular!

Lite

For speaking hobbyists

$0

Free forever

Included

*   Unlimited audience feedback
    
*   1 bonus giveaway (Talkadot code)
    
*   Up to 50 audience email addresses collected
    

Professional speakers trust Talkadot
------------------------------------

Hear real stories from our community about the results they've achieved with Talkadot.

I've been using Talkadot for over a year and it is one of my favorite business tools. It allows participants in my speaking events to give me direct feedback and it identifies among those people who is interested in booking or referring me for other speaking events. The reinforcing loop of opportunity generation is outstanding

If you do paid or unpaid presentations and want to do more, Talkadot is a great tool. You also get immediate feedback from audience members which is super-useful, and you get a link to share audience comments with whoever hired you to speak, which is a great sales tool for re-engagements.

![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/677df3bfb065267dc9d9863b/67b5a59ca560885e009d0d3e_Minda-Zetlin-Talkadot.webp)

Talkadot has totally helped me build an email list where I've never been able to build one before. It has also helped me get fantastic data about my keynotes as well as immediate testimonials, booking leads as well as referrals. It has literally changed my speaking business.

![Image 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/677df3bfb065267dc9d9863b/67b5a56e8e816411fa755d59_Kymberli-Speight-Talkadot.webp)

As a professional speaker, I appreciate the real-time feedback I'm able to garner from audience members via Talkadot because it helps me know how and what aspects of my message are and are not resonating with audiences.

![Image 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/677df3bfb065267dc9d9863b/677df517a3eb025e64260cc0_Jasmine-Brett-Stringer_2.webp)

Talkadot is the tool that SMART speakers use. Listen, you can go old school and TRY to collect feedback forms from your attendees. If you've ever done this, you know you never get enough of them completed. Or you can use Talkadot which totally streamlines the process AND continues to upgrade and uplevel the internal services that they offer for speakers. Love them and can't talk highly enough about the platform.

![Image 4](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/677df3bfb065267dc9d9863b/67b5a5525d16d90e1da690e9_Malla-Haridat-Talkadot.webp)

I just used it to counteract the lone voice who did not find my speech actionable. I shared with the meeting professional, well that individual was probably part of the 4% who did not and not the 96% who did. It was not a slam, I just had data.

![Image 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/677df3bfb065267dc9d9863b/67b5a53d8e816411fa753144_John-Register-Talkadot.webp)

What is Talkadot?

Talkadot helps speakers turn audience feedback into leads, testimonials, and rebookings—effortlessly.

Does my audience need to download an app or anything?

No, they just scan a QR code or click a link—no apps or downloads required.

‍

What’s included in the free version?

You get one feedback link, real-time analytics, and essential tools to start collecting leads and testimonials. No credit card required.

How does Talkadot help me grow?

Talkadot turns audience feedback into data that proves your value—helping event planners see why you’re their best choice.

Isn’t this an invasion of privacy or a bother for my audience?

No. Your audience chooses what to share, and they can stay anonymous if they prefer. When people know their feedback is valued, they’re more likely to engage—making it a win-win for both you and your audience.

What happens if I get negative feedback?

Negative feedback is private to you, but testimonials work like third-party reviews—honest, real, and credible. A few critical comments actually make your praise more trustworthy.

‍

I just want leads, not feedback. Is Talkadot for me?

Yes! Talkadot is built for effortless lead capture—no forced surveys, no unnecessary friction. If you're focused purely on getting more bookings, Talkadot ensures that interested audience members can easily express interest in hiring you without extra steps. Unlike generic survey tools, it lets your audience engage on their terms while AI-powered insights highlight your most engaged leads so you can prioritize follow-ups. While many speakers use Talkadot for feedback, it’s just as powerful as a straightforward lead-generation tool to help you turn every talk into your next gig.

‍

Isn’t Talkadot too basic for seasoned speakers?

The best speakers know what’s working and what’s not. Our tools go beyond feedback—they help you optimize, book more speaking engagements, and raise your rates.

Won’t using Talkadot disrupt my speaking flow, especially if I like to end on a high note?

Top speakers use Talkadot without disrupting their flow. A simple slide at the end keeps the energy up and engagement high. You control when and how you introduce it—so it fits seamlessly into your style.

My event host already collects feedback. Why use Talkadot

Hosts collect event-wide feedback. Talkadot gives you speaker-specific insights to grow your business.

‍

I already have a system that’s working. Why should I use this?

That’s great! If your system is working, Talkadot isn’t here to replace it—it’s here to enhance it. Many speakers already have a process for collecting feedback or tracking leads, but Talkadot makes it faster, more automated, and more effective.

Unlike generic survey tools or manual tracking, Talkadot:

*   Captures hot and warm leads in real time so you don’t lose potential bookings.
*   Automatically organizes audience feedback into an easy-to-use system.
*   Surfaces engagement insights that help you refine your talk and increase referrals.

If your current system is manual, fragmented, or requires follow-ups that often slip through the cracks, Talkadot helps you make the most of every speaking opportunity without adding extra work.

There’s nothing novel about this. It’s just a survey tool

Talkadot goes beyond surveys. We identify your hottest leads, turn audience engagement into rebookings, and generate testimonials—all automatically. Typeform and SurveyMonkey can’t do that.

Why don’t you offer a monthly plan?

Annual plans give speakers the best results. We’ve found that consistent use leads to more bookings—so we price to support long-term success.

How do I know who’s interested in booking me?

Talkadot highlights your most engaged audience members so you know exactly who to follow up with for bookings.

This seems like a lot of work

It’s not! Setup takes minutes, and once your slide is ready, you can reuse it forever—or update your bonus anytime.

Can’t I just make my own QR code?

A QR code just sends people to a link—Talkadot does way more. We capture leads, identify who’s most interested in booking you, generate testimonials, and automate follow-ups. No QR generator can do that.

‍

Will using Talkadot conflict with my speaker bureau or manager?

Not at all. Talkadot doesn’t replace bureaus. Talkadot helps speakers manage and close more opportunities. If you’re represented, you can direct leads to your bureau while benefiting from the audience insights and engagement tools Talkadot provides. If you book independently or work with a manager, Talkadot simply helps you close more of the leads you're already getting.

‍

Have more questions?  Join us on one of our FREE live demos!
